thread.title: Our Two Favorite Big Time Rush Singers Just Had The Sweetest Reunion
thread.title_full: Our Two Favorite Big Time Rush Singers Just Had The Sweetest Reunion

author: Abigail Williams
title: Our Two Favorite Big Time Rush Singers Just Had The Sweetest Reunion
text:
Our Two Favorite Big Time Rush Singers Just Had The Sweetest Reunion Be still, our hearts! Abigail Williams Associate Editor, News & Emerging Platforms at The Huffington Post Bryan Bedder via Getty Images 
It’s hard to believe that Nickelodeon’s hit series “Big Time Rush” has been off the air since 2013. Since the show’s finale and the boy band’s subsequent breakup , the former bandmates have been quite busy working on solo projects. Luckily, the guys still have time to catch up and hang out. 
Kendall Schmidt met up with Carlos PenaVega on Wednesday to meet PenaVega’s two-month-old son, Ocean. PenaVega welcomed his son with “Spy Kids” actress Alexa PenaVega in December. 
Schmidt’s playdate with baby Ocean was simply adorable. Feb 1, 2017 at 4:25pm PST 
”’Uncle Kendall’ teaching little @oceankingpenavega how to raise an eyebrow...he’ll get it,” Schmidt captioned the photo. 
Schmidt and PenaVega also spent some solid guy time flying drones and listening to Schmidt’s new music. A photo posted by Carlos PenaVega (@therealcarlospena) on Feb 2, 2017 at 12:22am PST 
“An epic day catching up with @kendallschmidt!!” PenaVega wrote on Instagram. “Missed hanging dude. This picture says it all.” 
Could these two be any cuter? 
Here’s hoping Logan Henderson and James Maslow get in on the group hang next time! Also on HuffPost
